# praiseme

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of praiseme is to give praise to anyone.

## Installation

You can install the development version of praiseme from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lennoxhemingway/Praiseme")
```
